metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1882 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s pipes functionality in how a user performs manipulations with the pipe post_one_notification() after free_pipe_info() that is already called. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.
